quotes.quote: Identity is a prison you can never escape, but the way to redeem your past is not to run from it, but to try to understand it, and use it as a foundation to grow
A poet's mission is to make words do more work than they normally do, to make them work on more than one level.
I'm not afraid of dying I'm afraid of not trying
We change people through conversation, not through censorship.
A loss ain't a loss, it's a lesson
Standing back from situations, gives you the perfect view
quotes.source: The Life & Times of S. Carter

quotes.quote: See how the universe works? / It takes my hurt and help me find more of myself
Strive for what you believe in, set goals and you can achieve them
Strive for what you believe in, set goals and you can achieve them
